COMMAND.NAME: setrect
COMMAND.PARAMETER: windowName The name of the e93 window this command will act upon.
x The position from the left side of the screen.
y The position from the top side of the screen.
w The width of the window.
h The height of the window.
COMMAND.DESCRIPTION: Change the position and size of windowName
COMMAND.STATUS:
This command will return an error in the following cases:
windowName is not provided.
windowName is not an e93 window.
